reviews.author: Mikel Bryant
reviews.review: Came to view the property and met with Kasha. She was so friendly and knowledgeable! I dont often leave public reviews but it was such a pleasant experience that I wanted to give a shout-out for her taking the time and answering all of my questions.

reviews.author: Nick Green
reviews.review: Not a safe place to live, only has residents due to there not being many options elsewhere. Loud neighbors who threw toys and trash onto our patio. Didn't seem to be any consequences because of how often it happened. Loud all the time, had

reviews.review: I am a current tenant here and have nothing but good thing to say about the manager Kasha and maintenance team! They are all very good at what they do. The manager is very professional and make sure she keeps the property is in good

reviews.author: S D
reviews.review: Worst place to live. Break ins and junkies running around in the buildings. Not a safe place to call it a home. On top of this, the management is very hostile and they lie to keep the deposit and charge more.

reviews.author: M C
reviews.review: This was the worst place I have ever lived and I do not have one positive thing to say about it.  Management was hostile and I have evidence of them lying and charging me wrong multiple times. They did not care about me being harassed by my

reviews.author: Lisa
reviews.review: I lived at this complex for many years, and had nothing but great experiences with the office manager Kasha she is very nice and does good at her job she always has a smile on her face . Apartments are nice and maintenance always comes and

reviews.author: Mona Santos

reviews.author: Rebecca Herman
reviews.review: The apartment: Very large 2 bedroom with huge walk in closet, open concept living room/kitchen, nice locking storage off the patio, nice vinyl double pane windows and sliders lets in plenty of daylight, stack washer dryer too!. For the rent

We absolutely enjoyed living at sunset pond.

reviews.author: nicole Derscheid
reviews.review: Dont be fooled by their cheap rent they will just raise the price without warning and keep your deposit. Awful

reviews.author: Ezra McConnell
reviews.review: Sunset Pond has a nice walking area. They do not allow pets and have an interesting group of staff members. The one thing that is quite annoying is the amount of times they need to come into your apartment. We are constantly getting notices

reviews.author: Cathie Oberg
reviews.review: I have lived at Sunset Pond Apartments for ten years.  I have been very happy with the personnel and physical appearance of the facility.  The management has always been very supportive.  I hope to be here another ten years.

reviews.author: Drew Buchhaas
reviews.review: Literal thieves. I will never rent from these apartments or recommend them after hearing they steal deposits for no valid reason!

reviews.author: Yvette Salazar

reviews.review:
I've lived in this place for five years, and there's not much to recommend.
The maintenance staff is amazing but the admin staff is extremely mediocre. Just today we arranged a schedule around an alleged water shut off that we got last

reviews.author: Sama
reviews.review: Sunset pond apartments is a great place to live its located near everything you need in town the complex is well taken care of and  the manager kaysha with the red hair is really nice and helpful :)
